betterquesting:10.desc:8:
The next step is we need to mix the Alumina with the Hexafluorosilicic Acid to get Molten Aluminum Fluoride.

We will need the following machines
1 bronze turbine
1 bronze mixer
power to run the bronze turbine
§3§4§2§a§9§a§6
The recipe:
5 Alumina Dusts + 9000L Hexafluorosilicic Acid => [Mixer 16 RU/t] => 3 Silicon Dioxide + 3000L water + 1000L Molten Aluminum Fluoride
§b
Note:  Previous versions would give Aluminum Fluorite dust.  Gregtech 6 version 6.16.24 changed to give molten Aluminum Floride so requiring a smelter is no longer needed.
§e
Warning:  You will want to use stainless steel pipes and drums as Molten Aluminum Fluoride can end up melting or corroding simple water pipes (rubber).
§f§6§a
To complete the quest collect in a drum
1000L of Molten Aluminum Fluoride
